thread.title: Donald Trump Fires Back At ‘Saturday Night Live’ After Alec Baldwin Performs ‘Hit Job’
thread.title_full: Donald Trump Fires Back At ‘Saturday Night Live’ After Alec Baldwin Performs ‘Hit Job’

author: Kaitlan Collins
title: Donald Trump Fires Back At ‘Saturday Night Live’ After Alec Baldwin Performs ‘Hit Job’
text:
Donald Trump is fed up with Alec Baldwin’s portrayal of him. (Photo: YouTube screen grab) 
After the actor recreated the president-elect’s first press conference since getting elected — including addressing the unsubstantiated dossier that claimed the Russian government is blackmailing him — Trump went after “Saturday Night Live” on Twitter. 
“NBCNews is bad but Saturday Night Live is the worst of NBC,” Trump tweeted Sunday afternoon. “Not funny, cast is terrible, always a complete hit job. Really bad television!” . @NBCNews is bad but Saturday Night Live is the worst of NBC. Not funny, cast is terrible, always a complete hit job. Really bad television! 
— Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) January 15, 2017
